mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p.name ASC) AS ROW, (SELECT NAME FROM team t WHERE p.teamid = t.id) teamname, p.position, p.name, if(e.reason is NULL, "", e.reason) reason, if(e.createDate is NULL, "--------------------", DATE_FORMAT(e.createDate, '%Y년-%m월-%d일')) createDate FROM player p LEFT OUTER JOIN expulsion e ON p.id = playerid
WHERE p.teamid = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expulsion(reason, playerId, createDate) VALUE (#{reason}, #{playerId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE expulsion SET name = #{name} WHERE id =#{id}
